name: Ben MacLeod
title: Software Developer
about: I'm a full-stack developer living in Halifax, NS and working remotely. My experience is focused on Python, Javascript and .NET. I enjoy building CI/CD pipelines, putting apps in Docker containers, and writing documentation for developers or users.
Since 2016 I've been building APIs that power resulta's portfolio of sites including The Linebacker.

work.business: resulta provides data feeds and content powering a range of sports media websites.
work.business_shorter: sports media websites and fantasy projections

content: Took a GraphQL api from concept to production on time to support new product launch in 2018
Built Django microservices providing sports content like player projections and live scores
Moved legacy apps to Docker Swarm on AWS for easier deployment, rollbacks, and scaling
Worked both in-office and remotely as part of a distributed team

work.business: Garvin-Allen builds insurance policy and claim management software for the Property & Casualty sector.
work.business_shorter: insurance policy and claim management software

content: Rebuilt parts of legacy Delphi product as a modern C# web app, targeting the same database
Used MongoDB to store "work in progress" revisions of documents from legacy system
Set up build/CI systems including Atlassian Bamboo for both old and new software
Worked with clients to improve the reliability of our installers and related documentation

sections.title: Work Term - Protocase Inc
content: Wrote python scripts to convert CAD drawings into laser cutter tool paths, saving designer-hours

sections.title: Work Term - Petroleum Applications of Wireless Systems
content: Built interface with PHP and LabView allowing remote researchers to run programs on a testbed for wireless sensors
